product_name: Louis Garneau Mondo Bike Gloves - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Louis Garneau Mondo Gloves have vented gel padding that is engineered to relieve nerve pressure, reduce shock and offer superior ventilation even on your hottest, longest rides. Seamless backs with Air Zone vents fit tight, resist abrasion and offer excellent ventilation. Perforated gel padding reduces pressure on the ulnar and median nerves. Gel padding also absorbs vibrations and reduces risks of hand injuries. Palms dissipate heat quickly and help keep hands cool. Lightweight microfiber thumb; laser-cut finger edges for minimal bulk. Silicone-coated pullers at fingers help remove gloves; fingers have reflectivity. Low-profile, adjustable ergonomic cuffs. Louis Garneau Mondo Gloves for women are pre-shaped for dexterity and comfort. Closeout.
